mainMsg: This is my first website built from scratch. I started coding in August 2024 and finished it in October 2024.
subMsg: For now, there are just a few things to check: some articles, an about page, and you can visit my social media in the footer of the website.
aboutMsg:
I made this website for fun. I was taking a programming course and learning how to build a simple yet cool website.
Then, after a few weeks, I started my own web project. To be honest, I used AI for some parts since I'm still new to programming.
I used it for the JavaScript part and to improve some of my HTML/CSS code, but of course, I didn't make it 100% using AI.
Thank you for visiting my website!

ppDesc:
At iSHIUBA, we respect your privacy.
This Privacy Policy explains how we handle visitor information.
ppDCdesc: This site does not collect or store personal data from visitors. The only data accessed is related to the functionality of embedded videos and theme or language selectors.
ppCOOKIEdesc: We do not use cookies or any tracking technologies directly. However, embedded videos from external platforms (such as YouTube) may use cookies. We recommend reviewing the privacy policies of these platforms to understand their practices.
ppDSdesc: We do not collect or share any visitor information. We are committed to providing a secure environment for our visitors.
ppCttPdesc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.
ppCONTACTdesc: If you have questions about this Policy, please contact us at: t.me/contactishiubagithub.
